After the first month, you will be charged $<%month_price%> for each month you continue your membership. You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time. placements.termsAndConditions:
PAYMENT INFORMATION

When you complete your order here, you will begin your membership in Experian IdentityWorks℠ Premium. Your credit card will be charged an introductory rate of $<%immediate_price%>, plus $<%immediate_tax%> sales tax for a total of $<%immediate_total%>, for the first month of your membership. After the first month, you will be charged $<%month_price%>, plus $<%month_tax%> sales tax for a total of $<%month_total%>, for each month you continue your membership. You may cancel your membership and stop the monthly billing by contacting us at any time. However, you will not be eligible for a pro-rated refund of your current month's paid membership fee.
